content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Acknowledgement Form\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A copy of this Code, as may be modified from time to time, may be found at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pal.epam.com/pal_method_plugin/guidances/whitepapers/doc_POL_EPAM_SupplierCodeOfConduct_CA889CD0.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/SitePages/Policy/Corporate%20Governance%20Policies/Supplier%20Code%20of%20Conduct/Supplier%20Code%20of%20Conduct.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Ethics and Compliance Library (ECL).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I have been provided with a copy of EPAM's Supplier Code of Conduct and have reviewed the policies referenced in this training. I understand that although I am not an EPAM employee, as a Contractor when providing products or performing services for EPAM I agree that I will adhere to the principles of expected conduct described in EPAM's Supplier Code and EPAM's Code of Ethical Conduct.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions or concerns regarding conduct under our Code, please contact the EPAM Manager assigned to you to discuss or utilize the reporting channels identified within the EPAM Code of Ethical Conduct, which you are also being provided a copy of, found at\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://investors.epam.com/code-ethical-conduct-0\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"http://investors.epam.com/code-ethical-conduct-0\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
